sets.description: When at least **1** frost weapon is equipped, nearby targets will take **260%** ATK damage every second. When any frost weapon skill or discharge skill is applied, final damage is increased by **6%/9%/12%/15%** for **30** seconds. The effect of this matrix also works for the extra weapon slot, but only the effect of the set with the highest star level is applied.

After Pian Zhen completely uses up his Inner Strength / Combat Spirit stacks, base damage is increased by **12%** for **15** seconds. When dealing cold damage, all elemental damage increases by **28%/32%/36%/40%** for **30** seconds. The effect of this matrix also works for the Extra Weapon Box, but only the effect of the set with the highest star level applies.
